summary: This is a service request ticket from SigNet Technologies/Convergint Federal Solutions regarding a RAID system rebuild at the Federal Bureau of Prisons' Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York. The ticket involves technical support personnel troubleshooting and resolving a RAID failure at the prison facility.

locations: 12300 Kiln Ct Suite E, Beltsville, MD 20705
keyFacts: This document is a technical service request for rebuilding a RAID system at the Federal Bureau of Prisons' Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.
The service request was handled by SigNet Technologies/Convergint Federal Solutions for the FBOP (Federal Bureau of Prisons).
The RAID system failure was treated as an emergency priority request requiring next-day service.
Technical guidance was provided by Derek Barr of Qognify, including specific steps and a password (1111) for RAID initialization.
The service was assigned to technicians Jeff McKenzie, Justin Houston, and Jeff Cranor, with completion noted on March 20, 2019.
